snippet: In her fifth post, Jordan Schermerhorn, the winner of the 2012 win-a-trip contest, writes about low-tech, low-cost technology innovations that are saving lives in Malawi.
abstract: In her fifth post, Jordan Schermerhorn, the winner of the 2012 win-a-trip contest, writes about low-tech, low-cost technology innovations that are saving lives in Malawi.
